entry.title: KBFC-2 (flower & leafs adorn mittens)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Mittens
Price: 16.00

The perfect winter mittens for running, hiking, cross-country skiing and snowshoeing. Wear our coziest mittens with an undeniably Nordic flair. These mittens are the ultimate in cozy comfort, warm and breathable for  perfect extra fall & winter weather coverage. 

Fabric & Care
  • Shell is made of 100% Wool.
  • Lining is made of 100% fleece.
  • Machine wash, line dry.
  • Stays warm when wet and naturally resists odors.
  • Azo free dyes.
  • One size fits all.


    • Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
